                                                      int statusBarColor,

        1. Add fake statusBarView. 2. set tag to statusBarView.

      • setStatusBarColor

        static void setStatusBarColor​(android.app.Activity activity,
                              int statusColor)
        set StatusBarColor

        1. set Window Flag : WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_TRANSLUCENT_STATUS 2. removeFakeStatusBarViewIfExist 3. addFakeStatusBarView 4. addMarginTopToContentChild 5. cancel ContentChild's fitsSystemWindow

      • translucentStatusBar

        static void translucentStatusBar​(android.app.Activity activity)
        translucentStatusBar

        1. set Window Flag : WindowManager.LayoutParams.FLAG_TRANSLUCENT_STATUS 2. removeFakeStatusBarViewIfExist 3. removeMarginTopOfContentChild 4. cancel ContentChild's fitsSystemWindow
